alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 9:06PM PDT until March 26 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations up to 4 inches, with locally higher totals possible in heavier snow showers. * WHERE...Southern Washoe county including Reno-Sparks, along with portions of Storey, Lyon, Carson City, and Douglas Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm road temperatures may limit snow accumulations in some areas. Wet roads may turn into black ice tonight and Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
